phrases: We have at least three intruders
who have defeated Terada and Koyama.
It is finally time for you, the Awakened, to shine!
I am sure that you have all endured rigorous training.
And now it is time to show them how powerful we can be!
You probably do not stand a chance.
All the Scars were sent after the intruders?
This must be a huge deal.
Just how long will we have to be babysitters or errand boys?
Those of us who do not awaken will always be stuck at the bottom.
Eventually, we will end up subordinates of kids like him.
did you hear about the kid who was sent from HQ as a temp?
Apparently he is an Awakened Child created by HQ.
Are you saying a normal kid survived that insane awakening experiment?
I want to be in an experiment at HQ, too.
Do not even think about it.
It does much worse things than just destroy your mind.
I heard that it is so painful that people have even died.
After spending twenty years as a lackey in this organization,
I have learned that HQ is bad news.
What the hell do you think you guys are doing?
I cannot believe they lost to some kids.
Do not even think about it!
We will not get stabbed in the back, will we?
A powerful esper and a normal human are like night and day.
The difference in strength is astronomical.
It is not one versus ten, it is zero versus ten.
There is no way you can win.
If you do not awaken the first time, there is no hope.
Are we going to be lackeys forever, then?
You are okay with that, Gen-san?!
You really do not get it.
Claw will definitely reign over this world,
and even us lackeys will be rewarded.
Right now, we just have to wait and endure...
until the day of the revolution.
Looks like I found a rather special door.
Maybe it is where they are keeping Ritsu and the others.
I thought it was an intruder, but it is just security.
What are you wandering around for?
Well, I just got a little lost.
I have a terrible sense of direction.
I actually have not been in this room yet.
Maybe I will just have a peek...
You are an impostor, are not you?
I am telling you to let me see the room,
He is one of the intruders!
All of you, release your powers!
but they are not bad when they work together.
A normal human would not be able to get free.
You want to keep this up until you pass out?
you guys still reek of small fry!
just what is in this room...
Th-This is the awakening experiments room...
Th-They said that experiencing pain is one way to be awakened...
They are not too far off.
But, even after going through all that pain,
all you guys can do is momentarily paralyze someone as a group.
The world really does favor the gifted.
You guys have a better chance focusing on body building.
It is not every day a ghost wanders in here.
Why do not you become mine?
I will take good care of you...
You did not find them in their cage?!
I told you to bring them here!
It appears they got out on their own.
I will kick yer ass if yer talking out of it!
I do not like imitating them,
but it seems to work well on weaklings.
With this flame, I will defeat y
I cannot believe you thought you could fight me with that.
Man, everyone in Claw seems a bit
Are you the brat Koyama was talking about?
I will turn you into ash.
My barrier can hold up, is what you are thinking, is not it?!
The inside of your barrier turns into an insanely hot sauna,
so much so that your lungs will burn when you breathe.
It is a stupid error that amateurs make.
Well, are not you a spirited one?
But to fight back, you will have to drop your barrier,
and then you will be burnt to a crisp.
And if you keep this up, you will be steamed.
That means this fight is over.
Your options are burn to death or swear fealty to me
Now I will not spare you, even if you beg and cry!
But I guess this heat would evaporate your tears, too!
When I switched it over, my clothes got singed.
It is true that you cannot defend and attack at the same time with psychic powers.
So then, you just have to put up a barrier around the source of the fire.
I guess you are not listening.
You are causing a racket, so I will free you.
You can still move with those burns?
Perhaps people with pyrokinesis have a higher tolerance to heat.
your lack of flexibility was your downfall.
Maybe I was a little scared.
You are stronger than I was as a child,
but I am stronger now than you will be in ten years.
Um, I am looking for my younger brother,
and apparently he is somewhere in this building.
Can I do whatever I want with him?
I am going to go have a look!
If I do not hurry, my dolls will break him in a jiffy.
Quite the ability she is got.
She can remote control all of those wooden dolls,
meaning she holds an immortal army in her hands.
Look at her, so excited over finding a new toy.
I definitely do not want to get on her bad side.
We have to find the exit quickly.
Sorry, I picked the wrong route.
We are going to force our way through.
Do not look down on us, brat!
It looks like their espers are not that strong.
They are all on par with Hoshino-kun.
They would be scarier using their bare hands.
It is true that those guys are still useless as soldiers.
I do not see a scar like the trainers mentioned on him.
He is not a part of the upper echelon.
And now we get to deal with someone annoying.
We are in a bit of a hurry right now.
You can quiz us some other time.
I thought we could be friends.
I will take care of him.
You cannot beat me, no matter what you do.
It is not like you are dumb, right?
Maybe it is because I know someone stronger than you.
So he must be one of the intruders.
Then, I guess I will just have to use you as bait so I can meet him.
I see you are as ruthless as ev
Mukai, what happened to your dolls?
He broke all of my dolls!
He really is just a kid.
Are you violent, too, old lady?
You are not going to stop me
Her ability is hardening qigong, which she uses to divert all of her qi
into her fists or knees to make them more powerful.
In terms of pure fighting ability, she is top-class, even within the Scars.
Takeuchi-kun, you might actually have to get serious.
It will be troublesome if I let him use telekinesis.
It is not having much effect.
Is his qi guard really thick?
You came this far, so why are you crying?
Why do I have to beat up a lady, too?
are the biggest losers in the world.
You are quite the gentleman, but that is an insult.
I want to fight you fair and square.
Do not hold back, and come at me!
Looks like I drew the short straw.
I have never even heard of this.
This human actually made evil spirits his obedient pets.
You are good at running away.
But why do not you leave that body behind?
Is not it easier to run away in your spiritual form?
This body will not hold up much longer.
Only third-rate spirits would let the body they possessed be damaged.
But I have even less of a chance beating him in spirit form.
What are you trying to do?
Those things return to their master after they attack.
I wonder why they are trained to do that.
Maybe it is because the master cannot protect himself!
Now he cannot come any closer.
We can fight some other time.
I will crush you next time.
I am right above you, dumbass.
Man, I cannot believe you fell for that.
Three seconds is plenty of time.
You are the one who underestimated me.
Who said I only had two evil spirits?
You mean all of those around his waist are...
Takeuchi-kun, I am counting on you.
No one is a match for my super qigong.
I will win, no matter what!
His face changes when he is in battle mode.
Even I cannot completely read him.
I think you should all hurry up and run.
Not to mention, it is impossible to take over the world with psychic powers.
Why do not you use this opportunity to wake up from your dream?
What are you doing with the normals when you are so powerful?
And that is reality, not a dream.
As long as you believe that, you will never be able to defeat him.
I know you were trying to do something, but I am really sorry.
I am in a hurry right now.
Why does Ritsu have to go through this?
before I even used my powers, boy?
You are not hiding your hostility at all.
Then I will show you even greater despair, free of charge.
He managed to amplify the illusion Muto showed him and reversed it.
I am not sure if that was planned, or just his natural instincts.
It was totally worth using his brother as bait.
Out of the eleven Scars, seven have been defeated.
How should I explain that to the boss?
The guy who carried those two here...
There is no way he would lose to someone like that!
I see you captured the other intruders, too.
One of the intruders was an evil spirit with a very strong ego.
This poison jar has hundreds of evil spirits thrown in.
The one that survives after they devour one another becomes the ultimate pet.
W-Wait, even if you eat me, I have no nutritional value!
Now we can call for help!
We are not going to be able to get through.
Did someone important show up or something?
It is an insanely powerful esper!
The boss of Claw finally shows himself.
I am sorry I kept this hidden from you so long, Mob.
No matter what happens from now on, live your life to the fullest.
